column4: Hi. My Mozilla Firefox keeps being automatically updated to a series of 1.5.X releases, but it never gets updated to version 2.0. WHy is that, what do I need to change in my settings for it to do that automatically, and how can I do it manually? 'sudo apt-get upgrade firefox'?
You need to enable the !backports repository
thanks - via synatpic? by editing the repositories?
thanks - but I cannot see Backports? All the options are ticked (I using Edgy) - how do I enable !backports?
